Banner.Description: With a dynamic 4-year journey in tech, I'm a passionate coder & solution architect with a trailblazing journey from delivering global production products during college to navigating the corporate realm as an Associate Software Engineer. Proficient in Python, MongoDB, Git, & Linux. For 3 years I've left an indelible mark maintaining the Evolution X Android OS for Xiaomi Mi A3. Currently, I'm steering my learning voyage into the realms of .NET & Microsoft Azure Data Factory. Join me on this tech odyssey, where innovation meets dedication, & let's craft the future together!
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: My tech journey started in college, dedicating 3 years to delivering Evolution X Android OS for Xiaomi Mi A3 as a volunteer engaging thousands of global users. Now, with 1 year in the corporate I'm expanding expertise at my organization with a focus on .NET & Microsoft Azure Data Factory, showcasing my commitment to continual learning.
Beyond coding, I'm a speaker and organizer for nationwide tech events, emphasizing collaboration and knowledge-sharing. I do the same in my current organization as well.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Associate Software Engineer
Description: Currently maintaining the UI of the Pricing Tool, a crucial system used by all company franchisees for setting pricing fees during the US tax season.
Actively managing data binding operations between the user interface and the SQL database, including adding and removing elements as needed.
Providing valuable suggestions and actively implementing improvements to enhance the functionality and user experience.
Leveraging .NET, ASP.NET, JavaScript, Microsoft Azure cloud services.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Creator - MongoDB Community Advocacy Program
Description: The program enables enthusiastic program members to grow their knowledge, profile and leadership through engagement and advocacy of all users of MongoDB technologies.
Creators keeps the community updated with the latest trends in MongoDB and helps them to get started with MongoDB by providing them with the necessary resources.
Utilizing Blogging, Public Speaking, Community Engagement, MongoDB skills.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Python Developer Intern
Description: Authored over 50 RESTful APIs performing CRUD operations on MongoDB cluster.
Implemented core features for Channel Chat and automated Bot that eases channel management for an admin.
Gained expertise in Python-Flask, MongoDB, Linux Server, Postman.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Android OS Maintainer
Description: Maintaining an Android Operating System (Evolution X) updates and bug fixes for Xiaomi Mi A3 mobile phone.
Helping with micro open-source project management and mentoring new contributors in times required.
Constant contribution towards the community of the project.
Developed proficiency in Android Open Source Project, Linux Server Management, Bash Scripting, Git & Github.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Backend Developer Intern
Description: Designed One RESTful API for highly optimized and resumable file uploads to the organization’s S3 bucket and store metadata to database. This enhanced the file upload speed by 50%.

Written a Selenium script for adding some free useful simulations scrapped from an open-source websites that reduce the efforts of educators by 30%. These simulations’ metadata is also stored in database using the same script.
Utilized Python-Flask, Selenium, Web Scrapping, MySQL, AWS S3, Postman skills.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Evolution X
Description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of an Android custom ROM, which includes bringing Android 11, 12 and 13 to the Xiaomi Mi A3 when Xiaomi failed to keep our device a daily driver.
Provided timely updates and required patches for security vulnerabilities and bugs, ensuring that 2000+ users over the globe always get a stable and secure experience.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: G-Books
Description: Led a team of 5 Android Enthusiasts for developing an Open Source Android app during 45+ days of facilitating Android Study Jams on college campus under GDSC (local community).
Implemented the database models for the app and used the Google Books API to search, preview, and buy any number of e-books out of 1000K+ available over there.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Person Counter
Description: Scripted a CLI which takes either a video or image file path as an argument, count and display the total number of person, in the static image and at every instant while a footage is playing.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Temp Mail
Description: Developed a CLI which generates a temporary email address and displays it to the user.
The user can then use this email address to receive emails from other users and use the CLI to view the emails and sender details.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Expense Tracker
Description: .NET project prepared to visualise your daily expenses and visualise graphical based on categories (groceries, fashion, parties, etc .) you spend on.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: To-Do App
Description: A simple to do list app built with Django and PostgreSQL made to get familiar with User Authentication in Django Framework.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: IT Spotlight
Description: A minor project based on hackernews api aiming to provide tech news in an interactive and a better way than the hackernews official website itself.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Google Cloud Profile Badges Scraper
Description: Track digitally earned badges after completing Google Cloud challenges in Qwiklabs platform.
It also consists Github Actions workflow to automate the tracking process.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Google Developer Profile Badges Scraper
Description: Track digitally earned badges after completing Google Developer's challenges.
It also consists Github Actions workflow to automate the tracking process.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
